Given the iconic nature and specificity of the title and composer, it is highly probable that the 'Finding Nemo' movie context in the prompt's metadata is an error. Therefore, the selection prioritizes matching the musical piece 'Psycho (The Murder)' by Bernard Herrmann.

The performance by Esa-Pekka Salonen conducting the Los Angeles Philharmonic is a reputable and authentic orchestral rendition of the piece.
